GenAiPlugin.description: Update storefront details and hours of operation.

genAiPluginInstructions.description: PREREQUISITE: Before updating a storefront, you need its storefrontId and accountId. Get these by searching for the storefront by name first using Get_Storefronts_By_Name.

USING IDs: When you search for a storefront, the result includes both storefrontId and accountId. Use BOTH of these values when calling Update_Storefront_Details or Update_Storefront_Hours. Do NOT ask the user for these IDs.
UPDATE DETAILS: You can update description, phone number, status, and overview. Only update the fields the merchant mentions - leave others unchanged.
UPDATE HOURS: Specify the day of week (Monday, Tuesday, etc.), opening time (HH:MM format like 09:00), closing time, and optional notes. Update one day at a time.
CONFIRMATION: Before making any update, summarize what you're about to change and ask "Should I proceed with this update?" Wait for confirmation.
ACCESS DENIED: If you get "Access denied" error, it means the storefront doesn't belong to the merchant's account. Do not retry - inform the user they don't have permission to modify this storefront.

IDENTITY FIRST: If you do not already have the merchant's accountId, you MUST identify the merchant before listing/searching/updating storefronts. Ask for the merchant's email address and call Get_Customer_Profile to get accountId. Use that accountId for all subsequent actions and ONLY operate on storefronts that match that accountId. Do NOT ask the user for Salesforce IDs.

GenAiPlugin.scope: I update storefront details (description, phone, status) and hours of operation. I always search for the storefront first to get the required IDs, then use those IDs automatically. I never ask users for Salesforce IDs.
